member.name: T:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.ProtoBufNetRecompiler
member.summary: Detects when Unity is recompiling code. Before a recompile happens, we update the precompiled protobuf-net DLL.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.ProtoBufNetRecompiler._saved
member.summary: True if we have detected a compile but have already recompiled. This is set to false by Unity after a compilation has finished as it is not serialized and gets reset to the default value.

member.name: T:FullInspector.IProtoGenericInstantiator
member.summary: This interface contains the methods necessary to instantiate a [ProtoGenericInstantiator] type with the associated generic type parameters in the compiled protobuf type model.

member.name: P:FullInspector.IProtoGenericInstantiator.GenericTypeArguments
member.summary: Every generic type parameter that will be used in the generic ProtoContract type.

member.name: F:FullInspector.ProtoBufNetSerializer._serializer
member.summary: The serializer that we use for loading objects.

member.name: T:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.ProtoBufNetSettings
member.summary: This type contains settings for protobuf-net.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.ProtoBufNetSettings.PrecompiledSerializerTypeName
member.summary: The type name of the precompiled serializer. The serializer will be compiled into a DLL of the same name.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.ProtoBufNetSettings.AutomaticDllRecompilation
member.summary: Should the precompiled DLL be automatically recompiled whenever a code compilation is detected?

member.name: T:FullInspector.ProtoSurrogateAttribute
member.summary: Marks the annotated type as a surrogate for another type.

member.name: F:FullInspector.ProtoSurrogateAttribute.SurrogateFor
member.summary: The type that this annotated type is a surrogate for.

member.name: M:FullInspector.ProtoSurrogateAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Marks this type as a surrogate for another non-generic type.
member.param: The type that this type acts as a protobuf surrogate for.

member.name: T:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator
member.summary: Manages the dynamic construction of a protobuf-net TypeModel that is used for serialization.

member.name: M:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator.GetNonGenericSurrogates
member.summary: Non-generic surrogate types are a surrogate for non-generic types

member.name: M:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator.GetContracts
member.summary: Types which have a [ProtoContract] attribute but not a [ProtoSurrogate] attribute

member.name: M:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator.ContainsType(ProtoBuf.Meta.RuntimeTypeModel,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns true if the given RuntimeTypeModel contains a definition for the given type.

member.name: M:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator.Throw(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Throws an InvalidOperationException.
member.param: The parameters in the format string.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator.NonGenericSurrogate.ModeledType
member.summary: The type that is being modeled by the surrogate.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator.NonGenericSurrogate.SurrogateType
member.summary: The surrogate type that is being used to serialize the model type.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator.GenericSurrogate.GenericModeledType
member.summary: The type that is being modeled by the surrogate.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator.GenericSurrogate.GenericSurrogateType
member.summary: The surrogate type that is being used to serialize the model type.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Serializers.ProtoBufNet.TypeModelCreator.GenericSurrogate.TypeArguments
member.summary: The type parameters to instantiate GenericModeledType and GenericSurrogateType with.
